Title: Requires that certain land which was conveyed to the town of Riverhead in 2011 be leased to the YMCA of Long Island for the provision of recreational and community services
Summary: Requires that land formerly used as an armory which was conveyed to the town of Riverhead, county of Suffolk by the state in 2011, to be leased to the YMCA of Long Island for the provision of recreational and educational programs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 495 of the laws of 2011 relating to the conveyance of land formerly used as an armory to the town of Riverhead, county of Suffolk, in relation to the use of such property
